snippet: With the presidential election over, Wall Street titans who supported Mitt Romney now face the prospect of having to mend fences with the Obama administration.
abstract: With the presidential election over, Wall Street titans who supported Mitt Romney now face the prospect of having to mend fences with the Obama administration.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

headline.main: On Wall Street, Time to Mend Fences With Obama
headline.print_headline: On Wall Street, Time to Mend Fences With Obama

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
